title: FS: Low grade EPDGs - BOTH SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Low grade EPDGs - BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
Couple of low grade EPDGs available. McQuillan ball in hand is lowish pop and the Howell is really tough….I believe Howell was the last documented EPDG when the lists were made here on N54 and through t206resource.

Regardless, good pair

$sold McQuillan
$sold Howell hands waist.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2maKZMU][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/51306260594_5bc87c4cda_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2maCuh8][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/51304795527_ced400e34a_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[quote name="deadballfreaK" post=2122327]I'll take McQuillan.[/QUOTE]
